scripts.produce_edimax_software: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_edimax_software      && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=edimax PRODUCT=software DEMOMODE=false    webpack --progress
scripts.produce_edimax_cloud: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_edimax_cloud         && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=edimax PRODUCT=cloud DEMOMODE=false       webpack --progress
scripts.demo_edimax_software: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_edimax_software      && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=edimax PRODUCT=software DEMOMODE=true     webpack --progress
scripts.demo_edimax_cloud: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_edimax_cloud         && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=edimax PRODUCT=cloud DEMOMODE=true        webpack --progress
scripts.produce_generic_software: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_generic_software     && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=generic PRODUCT=software DEMOMODE=false   webpack --progress
scripts.produce_generic_cloud: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_generic_cloud        && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=generic PRODUCT=cloud DEMOMODE=false      webpack --progress
scripts.demo_generic_software: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_generic_software     && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=generic PRODUCT=software DEMOMODE=true    webpack --progress
scripts.demo_generic_cloud: npm run cleanDist  && npm run gulp_public_generic_cloud        && SECURITY=public CUSTOMER=generic PRODUCT=cloud DEMOMODE=true       webpack --progress
scripts.build: npm run cleanDist && gulp && cross-env PRODUCT=cloud DEMOMODE=false   webpack --progress
scripts.start: npm run cleanDist && gulp && cross-env PRODUCT=cloud DEMOMODE=false webpack-dev-server --host 0.0.0.0 --config ./webpack.config.js --progress
